publications.title: Semantic Segmentation with Deep Convolutional Nets and Conditional Random Fields
publications.summary: This work presents a framework combining deep convolutional networks and conditional random fields for semantic segmentation and shows significant improvements over previous methods.

publications.title: DenseCRF: Fully Connected Conditional Random Fields with Efficient Mean Field Inference
publications.summary: This paper introduces a method for efficiently performing inference in fully connected conditional random fields, leading to significant improvements in speed and accuracy.

projects.name: Deep Learning for Computer Vision
projects.description: Exploration of deep learning techniques applied to various computer vision tasks such as object detection, segmentation, and image synthesis.

projects.name: Exploring Labeling Systems for Computer Vision
projects.description: Research on different labeling systems in vision applications and how they can enhance learning and performance in object recognition.

courses: CS 396: Advanced Topics in Computer Vision
